root: ^On second thought, I'm gonna stay here.
^Ok. I didn't wanna have to do this.
^I must call my most trusted, most valuable ally.
^The one person who has my back despite everything bad that's happened between us.
^You reach for your phone and you realize its gone.
^In fact, all your belongings like your wallet and keys are gone.
^Can you hear me? I assume from that startled scream that you can.
^Who am I speaking to? I am being held here against my will!
^This is a clear violation of my rights. If I don't get a phone call this insta-
^I'm sorry, Nicholas. This isn't way I wanted to prep you.
^We're on a ticking clock here, Nicholas.
^Right now, your mind has been...shattered. It's damaged.
^Hold on there a second. Don't tell me this is some kinda mind palace.
^In a way? I'm impressed, you caught on quick.
^It's not that hard to believe I'm not in the real world right now.
^Then that makes this next part easier.
^I'm currenly in the process of repairing your brain.
^To do so we have to navigate to various core memories of yours in order to do so.
^And I'm at this broken down supermarket for what reason?
^There's something important to you here. Your subconscious has guided you here for something. It's...a number judging by the readings I'm getting?
^A number? Look, friend. I'm not sure you know but there's a lot of numbers in the world.
^What you want me to start counting? 1, 2, 3, 4...
^Your mind wants to be repaired so it brought you here for a reason.
^That's all the help I can give you at the moment. We're both a bit lost here so let's help each other out.
